mapper.select: SELECT BPARTNER.BPRNUM_0 AS CustomerCode, BPARTNER.BPRNAM_0+BPARTNER.BPRNAM_1 AS CustomerName FROM EXPLOIT.BPARTNER AS BPARTNER INNER JOIN EXPLOIT.BPCUSTOMER AS BPCUSTOMER ON BPARTNER.BPRNUM_0 = BPCUSTOMER.BPCNUM_0 WHERE BPARTNER.BPRNUM_0 LIKE #{CustomerCodeOrName} OR BPARTNER.BPRNAM_0 LIKE #{CustomerCodeOrName} OR BPARTNER.BPRNAM_1 LIKE #{CustomerCodeOrName} ORDER BY BPRNUM_0 ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{Count} ROWS ONLY

SELECT BPARTNER.BPRNUM_0 AS CustomerCode, BPARTNER.BPRNAM_0 AS CustomerName0, BPARTNER.BPRNAM_1 AS CustomerName1, BPADDRESS.BPAADDLIG_0 AS Address0, BPADDRESS.BPAADDLIG_1 AS Address1, BPADDRESS.POSCOD_0 AS PostCode, BPADDRESS.CRYNAM_0 AS Country, BPADDRESS.SAT_0 AS State, BPADDRESS.CTY_0 AS City, BPADDRESS.TEL_0 AS Tel0, BPADDRESS.TEL_1 AS Tel1, BPADDRESS.TEL_2 AS Tel2, BPADDRESS.TEL_3 AS Tel3, BPADDRESS.TEL_4 AS Tel4, BPADDRESS.FAX_0 AS Fax0, BPADDRESS.MOB_0 AS Mobile0, BPADDRESS.WEB_0 AS Email0, BPADDRESS.WEB_1 AS Email1, BPADDRESS.WEB_2 AS Email2, BPADDRESS.WEB_3 AS Email3, BPADDRESS.WEB_4 AS Email4, BPADDRESS.FCYWEB_0 AS WebSite FROM EXPLOIT.BPARTNER AS BPARTNER LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.BPADDRESS AS BPADDRESS ON BPARTNER.BPRNUM_0 = BPADDRESS.BPANUM_0 WHERE BPARTNER.BPRNUM_0 = #{CustomerCode}

SELECT DISTINCT SORDER.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDER.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDER.CUR_0 AS Currency, SUM(SORDER.ORDATI_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDER.SALFCY_0, SORDER.BPCORD_0, CUR_0 ) AS Amount FROM EXPLOIT.SORDER AS SORDER WHERE BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND (SORDER.ORDDAT_0 BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime, #{DateFrom},120) AND CONVERT(datetime, #{DateTo},120) )

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, 'Project' AS CountType, COUNT(SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDERQ.SALFCY_0, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0) AS Qty FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ WHERE SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND (SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0 BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime, #{DateFrom},120) AND CONVERT(datetime, #{DateTo},120) )

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, 'Item' AS CountType, SUM(SORDERQ.QTY_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDERQ.SALFCY_0, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0) AS Qty FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ WHERE SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND (SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0 BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime, #{DateFrom},120) AND CONVERT(datetime, #{DateTo},120) )

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, 'Product' AS CountType, COUNT(SORDERQ.ITMREF_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDERQ.SALFCY_0, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0) AS Qty FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ WHERE SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND (SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0 BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime, #{DateFrom},120) AND CONVERT(datetime, #{DateTo},120) )

SELECT DISTINCT SORDER.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDER.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDER.CUR_0 AS Currency, SUM(SORDER.ORDATI_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDER.SALFCY_0, SORDER.BPCORD_0, CUR_0 ) AS Amount FROM EXPLOIT.SORDER AS SORDER WHERE BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND SORDER.ORDSTA_0 != 2

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, 'Project' AS CountType, COUNT(SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDERQ.SALFCY_0, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0) AS Qty FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDER AS SORDER ON SORDER.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 WHERE SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND SORDER.ORDSTA_0 != 2

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, 'Item' AS CountType, SUM(SORDERQ.QTY_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDERQ.SALFCY_0, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0) AS Qty FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDER AS SORDER ON SORDER.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 WHERE SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND SORDER.ORDSTA_0 != 2

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, 'Product' AS CountType, COUNT(SORDERQ.ITMREF_0) OVER (PARTITION BY SORDERQ.SALFCY_0, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0) AS Qty FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDER AS SORDER ON SORDER.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 WHERE SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND SORDER.ORDSTA_0 != 2

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AS OrderNO, SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 AS ProjectNO, SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SORDERP.ITMDES_0 AS Description, SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0 AS OrderDate, SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0 AS DemandDate, SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0 AS ShipDate, SORDERQ.SDHNUM_0 AS DeliveryNO, DATEDIFF(day,SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0, SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0) AS DaysNeed FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDERP AS SORDERP ON SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AND SORDERP.SOPLIN_0 = SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 WHERE SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 ='ZHU' AND SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND (SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0 BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime, #{DateFrom},120) AND CONVERT(datetime, #{DateTo},120) ) ORDER BY SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AS OrderNO, SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 AS ProjectNO, SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SORDERP.ITMDES_0 AS Description, SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0 AS OrderDate, SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0 AS DemandDate, SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0 AS ShipDate, SORDERQ.SDHNUM_0 AS DeliveryNO, IIF(SORDERQ.SDHNUM_0 = '' AND getDate()>SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0, DATEDIFF(day,SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0,getDate()) , DATEDIFF(day,SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0, SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0)) AS DaysDelay FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDERP AS SORDERP ON SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AND SORDERP.SOPLIN_0 = SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 WHERE SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 ='ZHU' AND SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND (SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0 BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime, #{DateFrom},120) AND CONVERT(datetime, #{DateTo},120) ) AND (SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0 - SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0 >0 OR SORDERQ.SDHNUM_0 IS NULL ) ORDER BY SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0

SELECT DISTINCT SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 AS Site, SORDERQ.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AS OrderNO, SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 AS ProjectNO, SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SORDERP.ITMDES_0 AS Description, SORDERQ.ORDDAT_0 AS OrderDate, SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0 AS DemandDate, SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0 AS ShipDate, IIF(SORDERQ.SDHNUM_0 = '' AND getDate()>SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0, DATEDIFF(day,SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0,getDate()) , DATEDIFF(day,SORDERQ.SHIDAT_0, SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0)) AS DaysDelay FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDER AS SORDER ON SORDER.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDERP AS SORDERP ON SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 AND SORDERP.SOPLIN_0 = SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 WHERE SORDERQ.BPCORD_0=#{CustomerCode} AND SORDER.ORDSTA_0 != 2 ORDER BY SORDERQ.DEMDLVDAT_0 ASC
